import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Card, Row, Col, Form, Button, Tooltip } from 'react-bootstrap'; import prev from '../../../img/prev.png'; import next from '../../../img/next.png'; import styles from '../FormsBase.module.css'; const MarksCompletionForm = ({ studentData }) => { const [currentStep, setCurrentStep] = useState(0); const nextStep = () => { setCurrentStep(currentStep + 1); }; const prevStep = () => { setCurrentStep(currentStep - 1); }; const [formState, setFormState] = useState({ numberOfDebts: studentData.user[0].number_of_debts || '', certificateDate: studentData.user[0].certificate_of_curriculum_completion || '', recordBookSubmitted: studentData.user[0].record_book_submitted || false, diplomaWithHonors: studentData.user[0].diploma_with_honors || false, publicationAgree: studentData.request_without_student[0].publication_agree || '', teacherReview: studentData.request_without_student[0].teacher_review || '0', review: studentData.request_without_student[0].review || '0', implementationAct: studentData.request_without_student[0].implementation_act || 'нет', plagarismReport: studentData.request_without_student[0].plagarism_report || 0, applicationForVacation: studentData.user[0].application_for_postgraduate_leave || 'нет', recommendedForAdmission: studentData.user[0].recommended_for_admission || 'нет', typeOfFqw: studentData.request_without_student[0].type_of_fqw || 'академическое', additionalInformation: studentData.additional_information || '', fqwByApplication: studentData.request_without_student[0].theme.fqw_by_application || 'предприятия', fqwInEnglish: studentData.request_without_student[0].fqw_in_english || 'нет', fqwRecommended: studentData.request_without_student[0].fqw_recommended || 'к внедрению', specialConditions: studentData.request_without_student[0].special_conditions || 'не требуется', }); const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = event.target; setFormState({ ...formState, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value, }); }; return (

Форма

{currentStep === 0 && (
Долги Справка о выполнении уч.плана Сдана зачетка Красный диплом Согласие на публикацию Отзыв Рецензия Акт о внедрении Отчет о плагиате
)} {currentStep === 1 && (
Заявление на отпуск Рекомендовано к поступлению Тип ВКР Доп. информация ВКР по заявке ВКР на англ.яз. ВКР рекомендована Особые условия
)}
{currentStep > 0 && ( )} {currentStep < 1 && ( )}
); }; export default MarksCompletionForm;
